name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Robert MYER, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Robert MYER, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of October, 2012, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED and Petitioner’s Application for Leave to Proceed Pro Se is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
55 A.3d 1049
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Robert MYER, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 18, 2012.
